name: The Last Blossom
description:
Please Use Full Screen!

Made in 3 days (started late).

A Semi Puzzle-Platforming Game about Slamming a Bouncing Ball of Energy into a Lifeless, Grey World in Order to Plant and Ultimately Blossom, New Colourful Life Before you Die!

Controls:

  • [Hold Left Click & Release] - Slow time briefly and aim where you want to go. Release to Propel yourself. Only when Propel Meter is full! (icon at bottom of screen pulsates).
  • [Aim with Mouse] - You can very slightly influence where you move!
  • [R key] - Quick restart.

 Info:

  • [Score] - Collide with all Light-Grey Objects before you die, remaining Objects are indicated at bottom of screen. Successfully Colliding with Light-Grey Objects turns them red!
  • [Timer] - When this Ends, you Die and any Seeds planted will Blossom.
  • [Propel Meter] - Slowly refills, collide with Grey Objects to refill by half a meter. 
  • [Meter Power Up] - (bar icon in a Circle), pick this up to instantly refill your Propel Meter!
  • [Timer Power Up] - (T in a Circle icon), Pick this up to add extra time to the clock!
  • [Light Blue Wall] - These Shatter on touch, does not add to score.
  • [Dark Blue Wall] - These Cannot Shatter, does not add to score.

This is my first time making anything that isn't grid based or a complete puzzle game, tell me what you think!
